name: Pong (itch) (N4SONIC)
description:
Keyboard
W = Up
S = Down
ESC = Pause/Continue

Gamepad (Only Testet on Xbox 360 Gamepad!)
Left Joystick = Up/Down

New Update is Out!

Version 1.2 (15.05.16)
- Added New Colors (The Paddle, Ball, Middle Line and Background have a new Color)

- Added Particle Effect (If the Ball hit something)

- Added Screen Shake (If the Ball hit on something)

- Added Ball Trial (The Ball have a Trail)

- Added Scale Effect to the Ball (If the Ball hit on something)

- Added 2 New Sounds (If the Ball hits the wall or the paddles)

Version 1.1 (11.05.16)
- Added Menu (You can now Pause the game with "ESC" and Continue.)

- Added Better Enemy AI (Before you play the game you can choose how difficult are the Enemy is.)
